risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).

exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Neptune: act, iterate, measure; Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; tone: opportunity/skill).
